>So said Dave Astels on 2003-07-25 --------------------

>> >So said Dave Astels on 2003-07-25 --------------------
>
>> >Something to do with being in Toronto, no doubt.
>> 
>> Ah! Proof that mine is the superior approach, then. :)
>
>Ya.. whatever ;-)
>
>[seriously, though... I'd consider moving to downtown Toronto at some
>point.. the more I visit.. the more I like it.  I was recently staying
>at the Crowne Plaza for Smalltalk Solutions and had a chance to wander
>around some.. all the way to Little Italy actually.. great place!]
>
>> I don't like tools that make it easier for me to do things that are 
>> a poor substitute for doing other things. That's my "anti-mock" kick
>> right now. :)
>
>Ok.. I'm sure there's logic in there somewhere.  I'm pro-mock myself.
>
>Should we get buttons made for XPAU?
>
>"Oh.. look over there in the openspace .. there's a pro-mock
>demonstration going on".

I may have to run the "Do we Need Mocks" session at OpenSpace.
